channel.title: UACCB Career Coach — Latest Jobs
channel.description: The seven most recent job postings near UACCB (Career Coach).

item.title: Housing Program Specialist (substitute)
item.description: Our House — Substitute — Open Lead Housing Program Specialist (substitute) position supports the housing program and helps homeless and near-homeless families succeed in workforce, school, and life through Our House's guiding principles. Closes: September 30, 2025

item.title: Housing Program Specialist (full-time)
item.description: Our House — Full-Time — Open Housing Program Specialist (full-time) position leads housing operations and supports homeless and near-homeless families; Our House empowers individuals through guiding principles such as hard work and wise decision-making. Closes: September 30, 2025

item.title: Behavior Support Specialist
item.description: Our House — Full-Time — Open Behavior Support Specialist provides mental health support for homeless and near-homeless families; the role emphasizes Our House's principles of hard work, wise decision-making, and community involvement. Closes: September 30, 2025

item.title: Behavior Coach AmeriCorps Member
item.description: Our House — AmeriCorps — Open Behavior Coach AmeriCorps Member (three-quarter time, 1200 hours) coaches clients in behavioral support and ensures compliance with Our House's guiding principles. Closes: September 29, 2025

item.title: Employment Coach AmeriCorps Member
item.description: Our House — AmeriCorps — Open Employment Coach AmeriCorps Member (reduced half-time, 675 hours) provides career coaching and resource navigation to Our House clients and supports them in employment and education. Closes: August 29, 2025

item.title: Community Relations Coordinator
item.description: Our House — Full-Time — Open Community Relations Coordinator builds relationships with donors, media partners, volunteers and corporate supporters and leads outreach efforts; Our House's guiding principles emphasize community and integrity. Closes: September 12, 2025

item.title: Cashier
item.description: Tripp Supply, Inc. — Full-Time — Open Cashier provides friendly customer service, handles cash and credit transactions, maintains the checkout area, and assists with light merchandising for a community-focused hardware store. Closes: August 28, 2025
